headline.main: WH Defends Pence's Use of Private Email While Governor
headline.print_headline: WH Defends Pence's Use of Private Email While Governor

lead_paragraph: The chief spokesman of French presidential candidate Francois Fillon said on Friday he was stepping down, one of the most high-profile resignations so far from the campaign of the conservative Fillon who faces a deepening probe into his financial affairs.
